thread.title: ECB keeps rates unchanged
thread.title_full: ECB keeps rates unchanged | Business Spectator

author: AFP
title: ECB keeps rates unchanged
text:
The European Central Bank is expected to underline its readiness to step up its â‚¬1.1 trillion ($A1.73 trillion) stimulus program after keeping its interest rates on hold.
Investors will pay close attention to President Mario Draghi's news conference on Thursday following the ECB's decision to leave its key interest rate at 0.05 per cent, as widely expected.
The ECB is injecting a monetary stimulus into the eurozone economy by buying bonds from banks with newly created money, in hopes they will expand credit.
The aim is to boost growth and inflation, which is way too low at minus 0.1 per cent.
Other key concerns for the central bank are a slowdown in China and developing economies as well as the rise in the euro in recent weeks.
